work-item.field: You should perform a Feasibility Study and document the results in the  document. If you have already performed this analysis, you can import the results from an existing Word document, either replacing the existing Feasibility Study document, or creating a new one in the Concept space by using a different name when you import. Remember to link the document on the Concept page if you import it with different name.
Perform the Feasibility Study and document the results.
